pages.title: Caves
pages.text: $(concept)Caves/$ deep within the world will spawn with large amounts of $(item)Magma Blocks/$, $(item)Basalt/$, and $(item)Blackstone/$. $(entity)Slimes/$ which die due to fire will also split into $(entity)Magma Cubes/$, providing access to $(item)Magma Cream/$, and a renewable source of $(item)Magma Blocks/$.

pages.title: Dimensions
pages.text: $(concept)The Nether/$ and $(concept)The End/$ have been removed. $(concept)Nether Portals/$ will do nothing, and $(structure)Strongholds/$ and $(structure)Ruined Nether Portals/$ will not spawn. Many resources found in these dimensions can be obtained in other ways.

pages.title: Bosses
pages.text: The $(entity)Wither/$ and $(entity)Ender Dragon/$ are disabled as well, along with their drops. $(item)Beacons/$ have been removed, although $(item)Elytra/$ are still available in the form of the $(item)Glider/$.
